Class MainPage

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • MainPage

  • public class MainPage
extends javafx.application.Application
    This is the Main Page class of the game from where the game starts It cotains the main functions and the main window on which our game will be working

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        This is the main function through which our game starts. Whenever our game starts it calls function initColours() which initialises the Color array.
        Parameters:
